author: Fixator10
install_msg:
Thanks for install.
`[p]godville` shows info about russian version of game (godville.net)
`[p]godvillegame` shows info about "global" version of game (godvillegame.com)
description: Get data about godville.net (russian) and godvillegame.com profiles
end_user_data_statement:
This cog stores https://godville.net API-tokens if provided by user.
Users may delete their tokens by either via `[p]godville apikey remove` or via data removal request.
